clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
findings: Breast tissue shows homogeneous lesion measuring 18.02 mm.
Major vessels show enlarged waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates mildly thickened, no hydronephrosis.
Prostate is mildly thickened; volume approximately 18.54 cc.
Soft tissue region demonstrates hypoechoic without fluid collection.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
